entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support launch profile configuration file named [ApplicationName].run.json in the app root #48200

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: Consolidate ResX files #48199
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Update README.md #48187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make some targets in redist incremental #48102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Basic support for launchSettings in the new dotnet test #48063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Simplify logic around _MTPBuild target #48097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use global temp directory for run file outputs #48169
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
